METHODS : This study enrol normal eye best correct visual acuity ≥ 20/20 , refractive error < 3.00D , without visible retinal pathologic change slit lamp-based condensing lens . Demographic clinical data age , sex , reason undergo FA collect . The far peripheral retina detect UWFA . The fundal field obtain use Heidelberg ultra-widefield lens single shot montage image compare acquire use Heidelberg conventional 55° lens . The sign peripheral retina detect UWFA describe group .
